TopicTitle: A-10C - Like the real thing, but less BRRRT

Articles.Content:
Hi fellow Kerbanauts!

First time posting on the forums, but I've played KSP for about a year now. While I love going into space and exploring what I can reach (which isn't far, yet), I equally enjoy soaring through Kerbal's blue skies in craft I design...such as this one I made tonight.

[B]CRAFT FILES
[/B][URL="https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BzHQIMX2N5hoNTl0NXpVNHFhOUk/view?usp=sharing"]A-10C (No Payload)[/URL]
[URL="https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BzHQIMX2N5hocm5UZF9FMENaVlU/view?usp=sharing"]A-10C (2x Missiles*)[/URL]

Press 1 to toggle reverse thrusters. This helps slow down the craft when landing. The A-10C is certainly not the most acrobatic aircraft, especially not in KSP. Keep this in mind when trying to perform feats, dives, etc. Because of the engine design, sometimes I found it easier to pull the nose up when the engine throttle is less than 1/2 or by cutting the engines completely (X).

*[I]The missiles are staged. Press the spacebar once to activate the missile's thrusters, then again to release them. Works best when throttle is at full.[/I]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WHbU20A.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IeFjPqa.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wp4ipVx.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/C7oCWBO.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FuzUWUP.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/E2XyOJw.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DxqgeB2.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/enHfVvw.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/63xCnh9.jpg[/IMG] Edited November 18, 2015 by PerfectH
How about a craft file? I seriously wanna try out some low-level acrobatics with that thing. Sorry if I explode it. Twice. Three times. 10 times. 100 times. Oh who am I kidding...

Wow.... I have been playing KSP for years and I'm not that good.... :(

Kudos to you.
I kinda wanna download that sucker just to add some BRRRT. :D
Just added craft files for download. Enjoy! And thanks for the feedback guys!
